column1: #Text=Huntsman says : " Great guardian of our city , we are venturing into the Spirit Wilds to bring back food for our people .
#Text=" Lion turtle says : " May the element of fire protect you against the spirits .
#Text=" Huntsman says : " Just make sure you aim at the spirits , not us , okay ?
#Text=I do n't think I can do this .
#Text=" Huntsman says : " Now , quit your whining .
#Text=We have n't even seen a spirit yet .
#Text=" Wan says : " I think I wan na go home .
#Text=" Huntsman says : " I knew you were nothing but a sniveling coward .
#Text=Go give your fire back to the lion turtle , and do n't ever show your face around me again .
